main event: A UFO sighting reported in Bay St. Louis, Mississippi on May 24, 1954, involving a large, stationary light in the northern sky that would disappear and reappear.
interesting points: The object was observed for over 20 minutes by multiple citizens.,The object was believed not to be an aircraft, meteorite, or celestial phenomenon.,The light appeared quite large and moved toward the southwest.,Witnesses described the object disappearing and reappearing at times.,Overall reports of sightings from the area were similar, suggesting a credible observation.
sighted object: large stationary light in the sky
